reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this water bottle, such a satisfying “sip”! Also, I think I found a secret!!!
reviews.author: Hailea Grow
reviews.content: Can I just say, WOW? This is an exceptional product! I feel like it combines functionality, style, and convenience, very well. As someone who values staying hydrated throughout the day, especially during the hot summer months, I found this water bottle to be indispensable. Here are some things I like about it:The SpoutThis provides the best “sip” period! It’s so satisfying! It allows you to sip through the built-in straw or tilt back to swig from the wide-mouth opening, giving you versatility in how you drink. Whether you’re working out, driving, or simply lounging by the pool, the FreeSip spout has your back!Insulation aspect works wellI’ve noticed that anything inside stays cool for 24 hours or hot for up to 12 hours. It’s perfect for those scorching summer days when you need to keep your water icy cold. I’ve found that even after leaving it in a hot car for several hours, my water stays refreshingly cool,Practical DesignI like that it easily fits in my car cup holder. That has been an issue with other insulated water bottlesSECRET!Pairing this bottle with Tan Maxxed Tanning Supplement has been game changing. These two have been my summer friends!Having these two items together all summer has been game-changing. While the water bottle ensures you stay hydrated throughout the day, the tanning supplement has given me a sun-kissed glow from within.Tan Maxxed is designed to enhance your natural tan, providing your skin with a radiant and even complexion. It contains powerful antioxidants like astaxanthin, which help protect your skin from UV damage while promoting a beautiful tan. Taking Tan Maxxed consistently is essential if you’re going to be spending time outside, as it not only boosts your tan but also supports your skin’s health.These products have given me a holistic approach to enjoying the summer sun safely and stylishly. My water bottle keeps me hydrated and cool during hot days. Meanwhile, Tan Maxxed has ensured my skin looks its best, enhancing my natural tan. This combination allows you to enjoy the outdoors with confidence, knowing you’re taking care of your body inside and out.
reviews.timestamp: Reviewed in the United States August 3, 2024
reviews.product_attributes: Color: Summer SweetnessSize: 24 ozPattern Name: Water Bottle

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Holy Cow! This is the most perfect product ever!
reviews.author: Russ
reviews.content: Whoever designed this water bottle thought of everything!1. The built-in straw is very comfortable to use. Like a sippy cup.2. Seals water tight. No spills3. Easy to remove the straw for cleaning4. The seam at the top with the threads also seems to have vacuum inside, for even better insulation. Many bottles just have a solid metal flange with no insulation.5. The straw extends very close to the bottom of the bottle, allowing you to get practically all of your drink. It even has a small dome in the middle to help with that.6. Feels very high quality.Wow. I'm blown away.

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to clean, keeps drinks cold, great value
reviews.author: Bonnie
reviews.content: This was recommended to me as a better value than a Stanley cup and I am glad I bought it. It's excellent quality.I like that this is dishwasher safe. It is a pain in the behind to have to clean bottles manually and they never feel entirely sanitary. The color is really cute, the size is a good portion for staying hydrated year-round (I can count in bottles instead of cups), and there is no metal taste. I like the dual tip and sip lid with a straw. I'm on the road a lot and feel safer if I don't have to take my eyes off the road to drink.I put ice cubes in it and mislaid it in my house for over 24hrs to find there was still unmelted ice, so if you're like me and your water has to be cold if you're going to drink it, this is your cup.

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Spill free hydration.
reviews.author: JB
reviews.content: It is the perfect size to fit into the car holder and is incredibly durable, making it ideal for daily use. The variety of colors available is a nice bonus, allowing you to pick one that matches your style. I've noticed so many people using this water bottle, and now I understand why. It excels at keeping water cool for hours, which is a game-changer, especially on hot days. I especially appreciate the smaller mouthpiece—it's a thoughtful design that prevents spills and makes drinking much easier compared to wide-mouthed bottles, where I often end up dribbling water on myself. Overall, this water bottle combines practicality with a sleek design, and I’d highly recommend it for anyone looking for a reliable and stylish hydration solution.

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Bottle with Room for More Color Options
reviews.author: Christy
reviews.content: The Owala FreeSip Insulated Stainless Steel Water Bottle has quickly become my go-to for both sports and travel. The 24-ounce size is perfect—large enough to keep me hydrated without being too bulky. The dual-purpose lid with both a straw and a spout is a game-changer, offering versatility depending on my needs. Whether I'm at the gym or on the road, this bottle keeps my drinks at the perfect temperature for hours.The build quality is top-notch, and I love that it’s BPA-free and easy to clean. The ergonomic design makes it comfortable to hold, and it fits nicely in my car’s cup holder, which is a huge plus.However, I do wish there were more color combinations available. While the current options are nice, a wider variety would really elevate this product. A few more vibrant or unique color schemes would make it even more appealing.Overall, this is a fantastic water bottle that does exactly what it promises, with just a little room for improvement in the aesthetics department. Highly recommend it for anyone looking for a reliable and versatile hydration companion!
reviews.timestamp: Reviewed in the United States August 8, 2024
reviews.product_attributes: Color: BoneyardSize: 24 OuncesPattern Name: Water Bottle

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great design and functionality
reviews.author: Melissa H.
reviews.content: I purchased the 24 oz FreeSip bottle in Dreamy Field and it’s a very pretty color combination. These bottles come in about 20 different colors, so there’s something that will appeal to everyone. I took it out on my walk today for the first time and it’s very user friendly. The carrying loop (which doubles as a lock when pushed down) is super convenient and comfortable to carry. It was not too heavy even when completely filled and ice was added. I love that you have the option of either tilting it back to take a swig or sipping it through the integrated straw, which I find to be easier while walking. It’s well-insulated and kept my water nice and cold when I left it next to my bed overnight. Easy to clean, but I plan on using it only for water (FYI it’s not intended for hot or carbonated beverages). I really wanted this particular color combination and it took more than five weeks to arrive from the time I placed my order, so if you’re in a hurry you may want to be more flexible on color than I was. My only minor complaint is that it arrived with a small dent in it, so I hope that it will hold up better over time than that ding might suggest.
reviews.timestamp: Reviewed in the United States July 20, 2024
reviews.product_attributes: Color: Dreamy FieldSize: 24 ozPattern Name: Water Bottle

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best water bottle
reviews.author: Kayla
reviews.content: I used to use a hydroflask but hated how all the lids had the part you drink out of exposed. I’ve had this water bottle for over a month and really like it! It’s the best water bottle I’ve ever had. It keeps the drink cold, the part you drink out of is inside the lid so it doesn’t get gross by carrying it around or putting it in a bag. The handle makes it easy to carry. I love the straw feature, makes drinking so easy and there’s less spills compared to drinking out of a hydroflask. Overall this is a great water bottle! The rest of my family has gotten one and they all love it as well! Highly recommend!

reviews.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Product Review: Owala FreeSip Insulated Stainless Steel Water Bottle with Straw
reviews.author: Staci Herring
reviews.content: I recently started using the Owala FreeSip Insulated Stainless Steel Water Bottle with Straw, and overall, it’s been a positive experience with a few considerations to keep in mind.Functionality and Design:The functionality of this water bottle is excellent. It keeps drinks cold for a long time, thanks to its insulated stainless steel construction. The straw feature is convenient and encourages me to drink more water throughout the day. The flip-up lid with a lock mechanism is handy for preventing spills, making it suitable for carrying in bags or backpacks without worry.Materials and Build:The materials used in this water bottle are high-quality and durable. The stainless steel body feels sturdy, and the silicone straw is comfortable to drink from. I appreciate that it's BPA-free and easy to clean overall.Maintenance Considerations:One aspect to watch out for is the lid. There are some spots where mold can potentially grow if not cleaned regularly and thoroughly. It’s crucial to disassemble the lid for proper cleaning to prevent any buildup. This maintenance step ensures the bottle remains hygienic and safe to use.Overall Impression:In conclusion, the Owala FreeSip Insulated Stainless Steel Water Bottle with Straw is a good choice for anyone looking for a functional and durable water bottle. It keeps beverages cold, is easy to use with its straw and flip-up lid, and is made from quality materials. Just be mindful of the lid’s cleaning needs to avoid any mold issues. Despite this consideration, I find it to be a reliable companion for staying hydrated throughout the day.If you’re in the market for a versatile water bottle that balances functionality with durability, the Owala FreeSip is worth considering, provided you stay vigilant about its maintenance.
reviews.timestamp: Reviewed in the United States July 7, 2024
reviews.product_attributes: Color: Retro BoardwalkSize: 32 ozPattern Name: Water Bottle

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sometimes you get what you pay for.
reviews.author: RobS
reviews.content: So the husband came home from our local big box with one of these for himself and ngl but I raised my eyebrow when he told me the price tag but our old thermoses were on their last legs so I shrugged my shoulders and forgot all about it.About a month later, we went on a day trip to visit the family in the next town over and, of course, we brought our thermoses.Later that night on the way home, his still had ice and water while mine had been completely finished long before. Impressive enough that the ice lasted in a hot car in Arizona on a 105F day for several hours but what got to me was the little inbuilt straw when I took a sip of his water.I REALLY liked that it could be fully covered by the cap when it's closed-- far more hygienic than those ones that just fold down.Okay, so that got me onto Amazon to check it out, which is where I found the third and final point that saw me splurging on one for myself: just about everything in the cap, including the cap itself has replacements easily available.Annnd that was that, really.I mean, yeah, my old thermos kept it cold at least long enough for me to finish my water, and I did still have the metal cap even if the handle (like the other cap that had an inbuilt straw) had broken long ago, BUT, I seriously missed the straw feature so I could have a sip while I was driving and I honestly did not know how much longer that remaining lid was going to last.So, yeah, sometimes you get what you pay for. Is this bottle pricey? Oh definitely! But, otoh, it has all the features I could need or want AND I see no reason why I can't be using it 20 years from now.So, if you're debating on whether or not to get this bottle, take it from me and stop debating and just get one already.
reviews.timestamp: Reviewed in the United States August 11, 2024
reviews.product_attributes: Color: Very Very DarkSize: 32 ozPattern Name: Water Bottle

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Are you kidding me?
reviews.author: Kasey
reviews.content: Are you freaking kidding? I wish I had known about this bottle sooner. It's my favorite one I own. Goes with me to gym, work, friends houses, the couch, bed, walking, and everywhere in between.This bottle honestly makes me hurt for those who go around holding their Stanley cups.If you have a Stanley or any other metal cup for that matter, stop, drop and roll and do yourself a favor and get the Owala bottle.Pros:This bottle has a typical pour back bottle mechanism for those of us who don't like straws. But it also has a sip function which I love!The sip function makes it easy to take a sip of drink while driving, laying back (not all the way down) on the bed or couch.The handle makes transporting the bottle easy when toting other things around. And also serves as an extra lock function for the lid.There is a secure cap that locks in place to cover the drinking spout. This prevents accidental touches to the place where you mouth is going.The lid (NOT the bottle body or straw) is dishwasher safe!The mouth piece (for sipping) is very comfortable, though it took me a minute to get used to it. I am used to straws and this was an odd sensation for a few days. Now I feel I can't live without it.The colors are fun and I'm a sucker for a "color block" look.Cons:I wish the straw was metal. Plastic straws weird me out and wear down easily.32oz Doesn't fit in most car cupholders and will require an adaptor piece to make it fit. Otherwise you'll have to place it on the passenger seat and it'll be whipping around with every break, turn, acceleration and stop. (Can confirm the main console cup holders on 2024 RAV4 fits this bottle.)Get this bottle, you won't be sorry.Oh and Target sells them, so if you wanna go check out how they look and feel, that's a great place to look. I got mine off Amazon cause they had better color selection.
reviews.timestamp: Reviewed in the United States July 19, 2024
reviews.product_attributes: Color: Retro BoardwalkSize: 32 ozPattern Name: Water Bottle
